H0.text: Derived from the use of naval artillery what is the nautical term for the top edge of the side of a boat. Rail

H1.text: Derived from the use of naval artillery what is the nautical term for the top edge of the side of a boat. Gunnel

H2.text: Derived from the use of naval artillery what is the nautical term for the top edge of the side of a boat. Wale

H3.text: Derived from the use of naval artillery what is the nautical term for the top edge of the side of a boat. Gunwale

A4.text: Originally the structure was the 'gun wale' on a sailing warship, a horizontal reinforcing band added at and above the level of a gun deck to offset the stresses created by firing artillery.
